column5: Today i was SOOOO close to a nickel....  I MUST GET HIM!!!!  I WILL GET HIM!!!     Stephanie brakes the ice with a Healthy 3.2 lbs Green trout.  There so clean.....      Cought on a chartreuse northam Buzzbait !8)  Then it slowed down..... DEADLY heat.... NO wind...  3-4 houres go by and its seems like only steph was getting them...  she got 3-4 of them.  nice 2-3 pounders.....  Stephanie gets a great idea.  why not explore this lake a litle more...  we find a bay that holds TRIANGLE HEADS!!!  HEAVEN!  I throw my BB Straight in the jungle of weeds.  The bait flows like the wind threw the triangle heads....Just like butter.  Then it happens.  A bass comes out to play.  a WAKE comes out of the weeds..... *BOOM*  Set the hook. Then the WEIGHT .  i feel it trust me.  my drag is set to the max i have 40 lbs Powerpro and a heavy rod...  Its pulling me right into the water.  GET THE NET! This time she gets him!  First thing i do i weight him....    the scale reads 4.11 lbs...... DOHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH    The only thing i say is .  NOT A NICKEL!?!?!?!?!?  Here are the other pictures of the \\\'\\\'Not Nickel\\\'\\\'      Seems like everytime i got fishing they gain onces....  whats next a 4.15.............................................................  24/7
Nice job you guys    Beauty!!! Keep it up!!! Jacques
you make me want to quit work and live on a boat
Such a great vacation and still got yer laptop and wireless connection.Yer missing the true meaning of "get a way".
Where's the crown...Bass Fishing KING!   Congrads, MTBF
I dont see a  crown but im real sure i see a horse shoe sticking out of his a........
Bring WhitespinnerBait along with you tomorrow = Nickel

Is that 4 pounds 11 ounces or 4.11 pounds.   There is a big difference.  4.11 pounds is actually 4 pounds 1.76 ounces.  I am assuming it is 4 pounds 11 ounces because you as what is next 4.15 which I think you mean is 4 pounds 15 ounces. Either way that is a nice fish indeed.  I would have guessed 5 pounds for sure.

this week its me and my girl friend fishing all our favourite lakes.  i asked her if she wanted to HIPHOP camp but she rather sleep at home and go fishing every now and then!  next week is 6 days on a island with old buddies fishing the same lake OVER AND OVER AND OVER!  your right getting away in the wild will take my mind off of things.  i WILL get away!  and get ready for a 6 day report misfish!  BUCKETS GALLOR!
4 lbs 11 onces!   thanx for noticing tho!
Good job dude. Don't complain about the lack of 5 pounders.. I'm personally faced with a lack of bass. lol
met too.  I went out today for 2 hours and managed only 2 smallies and the biggest one was 1.5 pounds
Nickel huh?  Guess that means I'm still trying for the Tupenny bass this year. Bleahhhh!!!!  JF
Excellent report and pics Kevin!!!  Some beautiful fish there!!!  I see the lovely Miss Stephanie is still as hot as ever!  Shoot for a nickel and a penny and you'll get the nickel!
nice buckets, eh
nice fish most guys would post them and call them all 9lbs  nice to see an honest fisherman, but you would never get on my boat with that attitude .....LOL
Big one. Great job!
Man, it don't get much closer than that! Very nice fish! Thanks for sharing!

you always seem to make her laugh with you replies!!  she sure loves you......   wait a minute..... are you guys chatting behind my back!!!!  stephanie needs a least 3 days of fishing per weeek.  can you handle that GDC!!!

to me nickel are so rare.....  i think i need to start flipping more often.  when i get the nickel youl hear about it!  and believe me this one isnt going to be a fishing story!  no 9lbs bass in this one!
the always seem to hover just below 5 , this year my best is a 4-14 good luck in your hunt , it'll come those are some quality fish no doubt

Looks like you have the place and the system down pat. Nice fish!  That "nickle" may be only a matter of time. Good luck!  Can you post more specifics on that digital scale you're using? Sounds like the perfect "de-liar".
sometimes i wish i could buy 30 of them and ship them to all the people who post's a 3 lbs bass and say.  im GUESSING its a 7 lbs bass.

Hey 24/7  Next big 4lb fish u catch hold it close to your chest...these fish look like 5lb+ fish when you hold them out...However they do take a nice picture and hey, who wants a slimy shirt lol.  Na, just want to see the actual size...maybe a quick length measurement for me  MTBF

the actual size.??  do you think these fish are photoshoped?  im putting the fish right in your face so you can see it.  who needs the lenght . im giving you the weight.  mesuring the fish is just something else to do and more time out of the water. wich i dont want .  im known as the EXTENDED ARM FISHERMAN.  i cant let these people down.  When i look at my pictures i want to see the bass Not my ugly face!  ill give you the lenght of the 6 + ill catch you can be sure but the 4lbs + are going back in the water A.S.A.P!  these 4 lbs bass are what 18-20'' maybe? somewere around that!  i remmember catching a smallie that was 19.5 '' 4.8 lbs.....  mike the bass fisher.  ill think of you next time .... the bass will be so close to my bodie youl laugh you head off!
